reviewText: Great guide to getting out of auto! Covers technical aspects and the art aspect. MeRa and Brian simplify the technical aspects so you can focus on developing your creative eye. Expensive? Yes but you will spend so much more on a class that will cover the same things. Great investment in your photographic journey.
This DVD is useless. In short, Keep shooting candids of children because sometimes they don't want their picture taken. I spent $99 on thise worthless DVD.
